ygData.msgSnippet: ... sporting ... going ... *Gasp*, I m just another bard!? :P  Yeah I ve gotten the helm, and have exactly half of every other quest (blah).  Myself and a
ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 1
> Date: Fri, 15 Oct 1999 09:41:50 -0400
> From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>Subject: RE: Bard quests
>
>I've gotten the arms. Karnek has the pants, and I saw another bard
sporting
>the helm. Only problem I've heard about is with the breastplate. I'm
going
>to try the boots tonight probably (whoo hoo! got another lambent stone), so
>we'll see what happens. I'm guessing its just the BP.
>Genni is definately in the temple, I don't remember the location, but I was
>able to deal with him. He's in a seperate location from the bards.
>
>
>Elwyn
>

*Gasp*, I'm just another bard!? :P Yeah I've gotten the helm, and have
exactly half of every other quest (blah). Myself and a Wizard ran around
getting all those pieces, unfortunatly now I need a group for the rest, and
as I'm sure you know, no one is horribly excited about doing SolA. I'll
probably try for the boots and vambraces next. Lambent stones continue to
be the thorn in my side. I just did the helm quest the other night and
Genni worked fine, might only be a server specific problem. Genni is
located (from the main bard quest NPC's), up the ramp in the center, through
the door, take a right and go through I think 3 doors or so, she is there
with one other NPC.

-Arithon, Erollisi Marr
